00017 // #############################################################################
00018 // Vector - Generic 3D mathematical Vector class
00019 // #############################################################################
00020 
00021 using namespace dg;
00022 
00023 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00024 Vector::Vector( Real x, Real y, Real z )
00025 {
00026         m_adC[0] = x;
00027         m_adC[1] = y;
00028         m_adC[2] = z;
00029 }
00030 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 Vector::Vector( const Vector & rkReal )
00032 {
00033         m_adC[0] = rkReal.x();
00034         m_adC[1] = rkReal.y();
00035         m_adC[2] = rkReal.z();
00036 }
00037 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 Vector Vector::operator + ( const Vector & rkVector ) const
00039 {
00040         return Vector(
00041         m_adC[0] + rkVector.m_adC[0],
00042         m_adC[1] + rkVector.m_adC[1],
00043         m_adC[2] + rkVector.m_adC[2] );
00044 }
00045 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 void Vector::operator += ( const Vector & rkVector )
00047 {
00048         m_adC[0] += rkVector.m_adC[0];
00049         m_adC[1] += rkVector.m_adC[1];
00050         m_adC[2] += rkVector.m_adC[2];
00051 }
00052 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 void Vector::operator ++( void )
00054 {
00055         ++m_adC[0];
00056         ++m_adC[1];
00057         ++m_adC[2];
00058 }
00059 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 Vector Vector::operator - () const
00061 {
00062         return Vector( -m_adC[0], -m_adC[1], -m_adC[2] );
00063 }
00064 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 Vector Vector::operator - ( const Vector & rkVector ) const
00066 {
00067         return Vector(
00068                 m_adC[0] - rkVector.m_adC[0],
00069                 m_adC[1] - rkVector.m_adC[1],
00070                 m_adC[2] - rkVector.m_adC[2] );
00071 }
00072 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 void Vector::operator -= ( const Vector & rkVector )
00074 {
00075         m_adC[0] -= rkVector.m_adC[0];
00076         m_adC[1] -= rkVector.m_adC[1];
00077         m_adC[2] -= rkVector.m_adC[2];
00078 }
00079 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 void Vector::operator --( void )
00081 {
00082         --m_adC[0];
00083         --m_adC[1];
00084         --m_adC[2];
00085 }
00086 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 Vector Vector::operator * ( const Vector & rkVector ) const
00088 {
00089         return Vector(
00090                 m_adC[0] * rkVector.m_adC[0],
00091                 m_adC[1] * rkVector.m_adC[1],
00092                 m_adC[2] * rkVector.m_adC[2] );
00093 }
00094 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 void Vector::operator *= ( const Vector & rkVector )
00096 {
00097         m_adC[0] *= rkVector.m_adC[0];
00098         m_adC[1] *= rkVector.m_adC[1];
00099         m_adC[2] *= rkVector.m_adC[2];
00100 }
00101 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 Vector Vector::operator * ( const int scalar ) const
00103 {
00104         return Vector( m_adC[0] * scalar, m_adC[1] * scalar, m_adC[2] * scalar );
00105 }
00106 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 void Vector::operator *= ( const int scalar )
00108 {
00109         m_adC[0] *= scalar;
00110         m_adC[1] *= scalar;
00111         m_adC[2] *= scalar;
00112 }
00113 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 Vector Vector::operator * ( const Real scalar ) const
00115 {
00116         return Vector( m_adC[0] * scalar, m_adC[1] * scalar, m_adC[2] * scalar );
00117 }
00118 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 void Vector::operator *= ( const Real scalar )
00120 {
00121         m_adC[0] *= scalar;
00122         m_adC[1] *= scalar;
00123         m_adC[2] *= scalar;
00124 }
00125 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00126 void Vector::operator = ( const Vector & rkVector )
00127 {
00128         m_adC[0] = rkVector.m_adC[0];
00129         m_adC[1] = rkVector.m_adC[1];
00130         m_adC[2] = rkVector.m_adC[2];
00131 }
00132 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 void Vector::zero()
00134 {
00135         * this = Vector::ZERO;
00136 }
00137 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 void Vector::negate()
00139 {
00140         m_adC[0] = -m_adC[0];
00141         m_adC[1] = -m_adC[1];
00142         m_adC[2] = -m_adC[2];
00143 }
00144 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 bool Vector::operator == ( const Vector & rkVector ) const
00146 {
00147         return (
00148                 m_adC[0] == rkVector.m_adC[0] &&
00149                 m_adC[1] == rkVector.m_adC[1] &&
00150                 m_adC[2] == rkVector.m_adC[2] );
00151 }
00152 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 bool Vector::operator != ( const Vector & rkReal ) const
00154 {
00155         return ( !( * this == rkReal ) );
00156 }
00157 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00158 Real Vector::length() const
00159 {
00160         return ( sqrt( x() * x() + y() * y() + z() * z() ) );
00161 }
00162 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 Real Vector::lengthSquared() const
00164 {
00165         return ( x() * x() + y() * y() + z() * z() );
00166 }
00167 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00168 void Vector::normalize()
00169 {
00170         Real fLengthSquared = x() * x() + y() * y() + z() * z();
00171 
00172         if( fLengthSquared > 0 )
00173         {
00174                 Real fLength = sqrt( fLengthSquared );
00175                 Real fScale = 1.0 / fLength;
00176                 m_adC[0] *= fScale;
00177                 m_adC[1] *= fScale;
00178                 m_adC[2] *= fScale;
00179         }
00180 }
00181 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 Real Vector::dot( const Vector & rkVector ) const
00183 {
00184         return (
00185         rkVector.m_adC[0] * m_adC[0] +
00186         rkVector.m_adC[1] * m_adC[1] +
00187         rkVector.m_adC[2] * m_adC[2] );
00188 }
00189 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00190 Vector Vector::cross( const Vector & rkVector ) const
00191 {
00192         return Vector(
00193         ( y() * rkVector.z() - z() * rkVector.y() ),
00194         ( z() * rkVector.x() - x() * rkVector.z() ),
00195         ( x() * rkVector.y() - y() * rkVector.x() ) );
00196 }
00197 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00198 void Vector::cross( const Vector & rkLHS, const Vector & rkRHS )
00199 {
00200         m_adC[0] = ( rkLHS.y() * rkRHS.z() - rkLHS.z() * rkRHS.y() );
00201         m_adC[1] = ( rkLHS.z() * rkRHS.x() - rkLHS.x() * rkRHS.z() );
00202         m_adC[2] = ( rkLHS.x() * rkRHS.y() - rkLHS.y() * rkRHS.x() );
00203 }
00204 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00205 Real Vector::angle( const Vector rkVector ) const
00206 {
00207         // angle = arcos( (A dot B) / (|A||B|) )
00208         Real dDot( dot( rkVector ) );
00209         Real dLA( length() );
00210         Real dLB( rkVector.length() );
00211         Real dDen( dLA * dLB );
00212 
00213         if( dDen > 0.0 )
00214                 return acos( dDot / dDen );
00215         else
00216                 return 0.0;
00217 }
00218 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00219 Real dg::Dot(const Vector& rkA, const Vector& rkB )
00220 {
00221         return (
00222                 rkA.x() * rkB.x() +
00223                 rkA.y() * rkB.y() +
00224                 rkA.z() * rkB.z() 
00225         );
00226 }
00227 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00228 Vector dg::Cross(const Vector& rkA, const Vector& rkB)
00229 {
00230         return Vector(
00231                 ( rkA.y() * rkB.z() - rkA.z() * rkB.y() ),
00232                 ( rkA.z() * rkB.x() - rkA.x() * rkB.z() ),
00233                 ( rkA.x() * rkB.y() - rkA.y() * rkB.x() ) 
00234         );
00235 }
00236 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00237 Vector dg::Min( const Vector & rkA, const Vector & rkB )
00238 {
00239         Real fX, fY, fZ;
00240         if( rkA.x() < rkB.x() ) fX = rkA.x(); else fX = rkB.x();
00241         if( rkA.y() < rkB.y() ) fY = rkA.y(); else fY = rkB.y();
00242         if( rkA.z() < rkB.z() ) fZ = rkA.z(); else fZ = rkB.z();
00243         return Vector( fX, fY, fZ );
00244 }
00245 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00246 Vector dg::Max( const Vector & rkA, const Vector & rkB )
00247 {
00248         Real fX, fY, fZ;
00249         if( rkA.x() > rkB.x() ) fX = rkA.x(); else fX = rkB.x();
00250         if( rkA.y() > rkB.y() ) fY = rkA.y(); else fY = rkB.y();
00251         if( rkA.z() > rkB.z() ) fZ = rkA.z(); else fZ = rkB.z();
00252         return Vector( fX, fY, fZ );
00253 }
00254 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255 Vector dg::Normalize(const Vector& rkV)
00256 {
00257         Vector kNV( rkV );
00258         Real fLengthSquared = kNV.lengthSquared();
00259 
00260         if( fLengthSquared > 0 )
00261         {
00262                 Real fLength = sqrt( fLengthSquared );
00263                 Real fScale = 1.0 / fLength;
00264                 kNV.x() *= fScale;
00265                 kNV.y() *= fScale;
00266                 kNV.z() *= fScale;
00267         }
00268         return kNV;
00269 }
00270 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00271 Vector dg::operator* ( Real fScalar, const Vector& rkV )
00272 {
00273         return Vector( fScalar * rkV.x(),
00274                                    fScalar * rkV.y(),
00275                                    fScalar * rkV.z() );
00276 }
